summary_gpt: Excel Industries Limited has announced a board meeting scheduled for May 14, 2025, to approve its audited financial results for the year ending March 31, 2025, and to consider dividend recommendations. The company has also continued its trading window closure until May 16, 2025, in compliance with insider trading regulations.

Excel Industries Limited has scheduled a board meeting on May 14, 2025, to approve its audited financial results for the year ending March 31, 2025, and to consider dividend recommendations. The company has also announced the continuation of the trading window closure until May 16, 2025, in compliance with insider trading regulations.

Excel Industries Limited has disclosed that it does not meet the criteria to be classified as a 'Large Corporate' under SEBI regulations and has provided details of its financial and rating status. The company reports no outstanding long-term borrowings as of March 31, 2025, and maintains a credit rating of A+/Negative from CRISIL.
